name: Type Gem
description:
**Unsocketed** - Consumable that raises damage of a move of that type by a flat 2
**Socketed in Accessory** -  1/Quest raises damage of a move of that type by a flat 1
**Socketed in Weapon/Offensive Instrument** - You can (not must) have your weapon attacks count as the type of the socketed gem, for weaknesses and resistances (Not for STAB and Shadow Gems can't be socketed)
**Socketed in Shield** - 1/quest reduce damage of the type by 1, after damage calculations
**Socketed in Support Instrument** - 1/quest after targeting an ally that matches the type, it makes that ally deal +1 damage on their next attack
